import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Loader from "../components/Loader"; import Message from "../components/Message"; import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer"; import {login} from '../actions/userActions' function LoginScreen({history}) { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const location = useLocation() const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('submitted') } return (

Sign In

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} > Password setPassword(e.target.value)} >
New Customer ? Register ) } export default LoginScreen
